name: Covid-19 War
description:
Your city is infected !
It has already got 100 Covid-19 cases .
Try to prevent more than half of the population out of  200,000 from getting infected and wrecking the city's medical systems.
Explore the city by using your drone and obtain the air dropped medical kits to keep infection rate under control for maximum number of days.

During this lock down times it is important to keep your self and your family busy without putting yourselves in danger . We provide you with this violence free game that  raises awareness as well as it helps keeping you occupied.
